thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Gary+McGay

author: Gary+McGay
title: Gary+McGay
text: I had no idea where to start looking when I needed to send money overseas via wire transfer for upcoming holiday accommodation, so I went online and discovered that CurrencyFair was highly recommended by the consumer affairs watchdog, Choice. I couldn't be happier with the cost efficiency, effectiveness and user friendliness of their service. A totally painless online process.
